title: Aave Community Voting to Deploy Version 3 on Ethereum - CoinDesk
summary: Aave community is voting on deploying version 3 on Ethereum, with initial interest rate models following those of existing v2 assets. Despite differences in stablecoin rates, the engineering effort behind v3 is led by Bored Ghost Developing Labs.

title: Ethereum Merge a Factor in ETH's Deflationary Turn - Blockworks
summary:
Ethereum's native token, ether, has turned deflationary for the second time since the Merge, according to Blockworks Research. Factors driving the latest shift include:

* NFT trading volumes picking up steam, leading to higher gas fees and subsequent base fee burn for traders.
* Lingering effects of the Merge, which transitioned the network from proof-of-work to proof-of-stake and impacted Ethereum's supply.
* The upcoming Shanghai upgrade, which will allow stakers to withdraw their locked-up ether for the first time.
* Ramped-up volatility in ether trading, which affects the token's overall supply.

Ether is currently trading around $1,600, up from the start of the year when it was trading in the $1,200 range. The cryptoasset has typically been inflationary, but it took a deflationary turn in November 2022 for the first time since the Merge.

According to Blockworks Research, Ethereum has about 18 times more TVL (total

title: Could Ethereum Hit $5,000 in 2023? - The Motley Fool
summary: Ethereum could reach $5,000 in 2023, but it's not a guarantee. The cryptocurrency market is still in its early stages, and there are many speed bumps ahead. Ethereum is a solid long-term investment, but it's important to be patient and not bet the farm on it. Instead, invest in Ethereum in small increments throughout the year, as with any other stock. The potential for triple-digit growth is there, but it may take time to materialize.

title: Ethereum futures and options data reflect investors' growing confidence in ETH price - Cointelegraph
summary: Ethereum futures and options data suggest that investors have increased confidence in the ETH price, despite recent corrections. The 3-month futures annualized premium has entered a neutral area, indicating that derivatives traders are no longer bearish. Additionally, options traders are comfortable with downside risk, as the 25% delta skew has stabilized near 0%. This suggests that pro traders are moving from neutral-to-bearish sentiment to a neutral positioning, which favors Ether bulls. However, the article notes that the demand for shorts using futures contracts remains thin and that investors should conduct their own research before making any investment decisions.

title: Can Avalanche (AVAX) Do a 50X? Crypto Bull Mark Yusko Says Ethereum and Layer Ones To Outrun Next Bitcoin Rally - The Daily Hodl
summary:
Sure, here's a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Morgan Creek Capital CIO Mark Yusko predicts Avalanche (AVAX) could surge 50x in the next crypto cycle, as long as Bitcoin and the overall market succeed. Yusko diversifies investments and compares crypto projects to internet infrastructure, citing their potential to survive volatile markets and provide utility. Avalanche is currently trading at $18.02 with a $5.7B market cap, and Yusko sees it as a potential intermediate layer or bridge connecting Ethereum.

title: Ethereum’s Shanghai Mainnet moves one step closer as “Shadow Fork” goes live - Forkast News
summary:
Sure, here's a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Ethereum's Shanghai Mainnet moves closer with "Shadow Fork" go-live. Software devs successfully deployed a copy of the blockchain for testing the March hardfork upgrade.

title: Wormhole Attacker Moves $155 Million of Stolen Funds into Staked Ethereum (stETH) - DailyCoin
summary: Wormhole hack: $155M of stolen funds moved to stETH. Attacker transferred 95K ETH to OpenOcean, then converted to stETH and wrapped stETH. Hack occurred in Feb 2022, with $321M stolen from Wormhole network bridge.

title: Ethereum-Based Gaming Altcoin Suddenly Erupts Ahead of $60,000,000 Token Unlock - The Daily Hodl
summary:
Sure! Here is a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Ethereum-based gaming altcoin AXS surged 50% ahead of a $60M token unlock. Unlocks are typically bearish, but AXS defied conventional wisdom. Next unlock on April 17th. AXS is up 100% YTD but still down 92% from its all-time high.

title: Ethereum vs. Bitcoin: ETH price risks 20% drop if key support level breaks - Cointelegraph
summary: Ethereum (ETH) is at risk of dropping 20% if it breaks below a key technical support level against Bitcoin (BTC). The ETH/BTC pair has been declining since the second half of January, with Ether lagging behind Bitcoin in terms of USD gains. The EMA ribbon indicator shows numerous exponential moving averages of increasing timeframe on the same price chart, and breaking below the ribbon range increases the likelihood of an extended down-move. A multi-month descending trendline resistance is also a concern for ETH/BTC, as sellers have been more active recently. If ETH/BTC breaks below the EMA ribbon range, it may test the 200-week EMA near 0.0550 BTC, which could result in a 20% price drop from current levels.

title: Uniswap holders propose ditching Ethereum for BNB Chain to deploy v3 protocol - Cointelegraph
summary: Uniswap holders have proposed ditching Ethereum for BNB Chain to deploy v3 protocol, with overwhelming support from the community. 80% of voters approved the proposal, despite concerns about centralization. Blockchain software firm ConsenSys supports the move, viewing it as important for Uniswap to be "chain agnostic" and serve all users within the Web3 space. The deployment may take 5-7 weeks, and the proposal is the first of three votes required to pass a governance proposal.

title: Where in the World is Ethereum? - This Morning On Chain
summary:
Sure, here's a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Ethereum nodes are concentrated globally, with the US hosting nearly half (46.7%) of all nodes. Within countries, nodes are highly centralized in data centers, with 64% of nodes hosted on cloud providers (primarily AWS). In the US, 45% of nodes are located in Ashburn, VA due to Amazon's primary East coast datacenter. While some consider Ethereum centralization a risk, the author believes it's manageable and balanced with the rate of progress desired. However, a single disaster could take out a significant portion of nodes.

title: Crypto Prices Today: Bitcoin (BTC) Loses 1.78%, Ethereum (ETH) Falls 5.55% - Outlook India
summary: Crypto prices declined in the last 24 hours, with Bitcoin (BTC) losing 1.78% and Ethereum (ETH) falling 5.55%. The global crypto market capitalization decreased by 3.42% to $1.02 billion, while the total crypto market volume increased by 0.46% to $56.94 billion.

title: Ark Invest's Chris Burniske Says Solana (SOL) and Ethereum (ETH) Are Key Indicators: Details - U.Today
summary: Ark Invest's Chris Burniske believes Solana (SOL) and Ethereum (ETH) can be used as risk indicators in the crypto market. The SOL/ETH trading pair can help determine the risk tolerance of investors, as both Solana and Ethereum are historically more volatile than Bitcoin. Burniske also notes that the cryptocurrency market is a reflection of investor risk tolerance and that digital assets are vulnerable to double-digit swings, especially with margin trading. He suggests that Ethereum may not retract soon, indicating an increase in risk appetite. However, the market's dependence on traditional markets means Solana and Ethereum should not be considered market-moving assets. In recent weeks, the cryptocurrency market has experienced a significant rally, leading to numerous breakthroughs and resistance levels.

title: Curve Finance to increase pools with additional gauges on Ethereum - AMBCrypto News
summary: Curve Finance, an Ethereum-based DeFi platform, is set to increase its liquidity pools by adding more gauges. The request came from whale addresses on the platform, who wanted more options for exchanging various assets. The addition of more gauges will expand the number of pools available for users and provide more options for exchanging assets. The platform's gauge system measures the liquidity of a particular pool or set of pools and determines the stability fee (or interest rate) accordingly. The move is expected to increase the number of pools available for users and provide more options for exchanging assets. The Curve DAO Token (CRV) saw a 20.89% increase in value over the past week, making it one of the top gainers in the cryptocurrency market. However, the token is overbought at press time, and a price correction is likely to occur.

summary:

Ethereum NFT market sees $231M in weekly trading volume, with 154K traders making 474K transactions. Average trader made 3.1 transactions, with $487 per transaction and $1,494 per trader. Entertainment company Doodles acquires animation studio Golden Wolf.

title: FBI Says Lazarus Group Behind $100 Million Harmony Bridge Heist - Duo Security
summary: The FBI has identified the Lazarus Group, a North Korean state-sponsored hacking group, as the perpetrator behind a $100 million cryptocurrency heist on the Harmony Horizon bridge in June 2022. The group used its malware tool, TraderTraitor, to carry out the attack and launder the stolen funds through a privacy protocol called RAILGUN. The FBI worked with exchanges to freeze the Bitcoin assets moved by the Lazarus Group. This is not the first time the group has targeted cryptocurrency firms and exchanges, and it is likely they will continue to do so to support the North Korean regime.

title: A big Ethereum whale buys $228 million worth of Shiba Inu, as meme coin gains 50% in January - Nairametrics
summary:
Here is a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

A large Ethereum whale has purchased $228 million worth of Shiba Inu, a meme coin rival to Dogecoin. The whale now holds over 18 trillion Shiba Inu tokens, making up 75% of their total portfolio. This buying activity comes as Shiba Inu has gained 50% in value so far in January, with the ecosystem preparing for the launch of Shibarium, a proposed layer-2 solution. Other meme coins, such as Bone ShibaSwap (BONE), have also experienced price rallies. However, investors are cautioned to be cautious when investing in meme coins, as they are considered high-risk investments with no real value.

title: Shiba Inu Kicks Off 2023 With 50% Rally, Becomes Ethereum Whale Favorite | Bitcoinist.com - Bitcoinist
summary: Shiba Inu, a meme coin, has seen a 50% rally in the past three weeks, making it one of the best performers in the cryptocurrency market. The coin's price has crawled back into favor with large Ethereum whales, who have renewed their interest in the digital asset. According to data from WhaleStats, the top 100 ETH whales now hold over $608 million worth of SHIB, which makes up 15.99% of their total token holdings. The SHIB smart contract is also the fourth most used smart contract by these whales. The launch of Shibarium, a Layer 2 blockchain, could contribute to a further increase in the price of SHIB. Currently, the coin is trading at $0.00001209 and could potentially reach $0.00002 once Shibarium is launched.
